job.title: Site Reliability Engineer - Kubernetes
job.description:
Title: Site Reliability Engineer -Kubernetes


Location: Dallas-TX or Jersey City, NJ


Experience level: Associate


Experience required: 6 Years 


Education level: Bachelor’s degree 


Job function: Information Technology


Industry: Financial Services 


Visa : Only US citizens and Greencard holders


Summary


We are looking for a Container migration SRE, who understands the enterprise containers in Docker Swarm to advanced Kubernetes platforms (OpenShift, Tanzu) deployments and has prior experience with container migrations and deployments. The container migration SRE will bring in Kubernetes deployment with software engineering SRE standard methodologies. This role will be instrumental in continuing our Container First strategy delivery, bringing expertise with, development, and implementation of container migration projects.


Your Primary Responsibilities


Lead the container platform ecosystem

Cluster capacity management and provisioning through automation of underlying hosts.

Understanding the infrastructure components (server, network, storage, firewall, load balancer etc) required for Kubernetes platform, Infrastructure As a Code(IaC).

Experience with a modern application software language; especially a systems programming language (Go, Python)

Understanding of architectural patterns; Microservices are important, but experience with other patterns helpful

Practitioner of version control; experience with different branching strategies (and understands why GitFlow is not a good choice for CI/CD and enterprise development teams)

Understands and uses unit and functional testing; ideally advocates tests up front (advocates tests for moving faster)

Experience defining delivery pipelines; demonstrable work in automation and observability (Bonus points for experience using GitOps for deployment)

Understand K8s resiliency patterns (HPA, self-healing)

Understands container image optimization


MUST HAVE: Container migration, Docker, Kubernetes, Infrastructure As a Code(IaC).


Qualifications:


Minimum of 6 years of related experience

Bachelor's degree required

Kubernetes and/or Tanzu or OpenShift Container Platform.

Kubernetes and Python

Expertise in Tanzu Solutions As A Service Offerings

Experience delivering infrastructure as code using CI/CD practices

Proven track record of applying technology to tackle business problems.

Experience with migrate/onboard application onto Kubernetes

AWS associate certifications or higher preferred

RedHat certifications in Linux and OpenShift administration preferred


If interested connect on Linkedin or mail on rita.d@a2zxperts.com

Please note Visa : Only US citizens and Greencard holders
